In some areas the density of its minefields indicate that it has likely used many more mines that laid down in its military doctrine. Having slowed the Ukraine in advance, Russia has then attempted to strike Ukrainian armored vehicles with one-way attack on cruiserial vehicles, attack helicopters and artillery.
